summary: This bill, known as Canyon's Law, aims to prohibit the use of M-44 devices (cyanide bombs) on public lands. The bill details the dangers of M-44 devices, citing their toxicity, indiscriminate harm to wildlife and humans, and past incidents of injury and death. It mandates the removal of existing M-44 devices from public lands within 30 days of the bill's enactment. The bill defines M-44 devices and public land, specifying relevant federal agencies.
